## Purpose

## Required Response (Explicit)

- `Approved — Stakeholder Executive governance sign-off for Issue #29 tranche closure`
- `Changes Requested — Stakeholder Executive sign-off withheld` (include specific blocking reasons)

## Decision Criteria
- Brand and business posture are acceptable for controlled release progression.
- Rollback posture and risk controls remain acceptable.
- Governance readiness is met for Chief of Staff release orchestration.

## Output Requirement
Include evidence references in the comment and a clear final disposition (`Approved` or `Changes Requested`).
